response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is not just a commodity; it's an investment in excellence and a testament to unparalleled craftsmanship. Given its significance and rarity, I understand its worth to be $1,000,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $950,000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the value it brings to you. I am confident that you will find this proposal to be highly favorable and beneficial for your needs. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
